parameters.name: CheckIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the check items.

>  You can call the [ListCheckResult](~~ListCheckResult~~) operation to query the IDs of the check items.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: IDs of the cloud product instances that need to be whitelisted. Separate multiple IDs with a comma (,).

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The description. The value of this parameter can be up to 65,535 bytes in length.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the rule. Default value: **WHITE**. Valid value:

*   **WHITE**: Add check items to the whitelist.
